long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy Chrome extension that lets you rotate any webpage in increments of 90 degrees, each time you click the extension button. This tool is perfect for reading vertically oriented documents or images, or just for changing your browsing perspective.
